casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James Edward WILLIAMS. No. 125P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 19, 2005. Christine A. Goebel, Assistant Attorney General, Ben David, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of July 2005 by Defendant for Leave to Proceed in Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 19th day of July 2005."
